channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- UMA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- UMA

item.title: CVE-2017-8119|2024-08-05T16:27:22.455Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- uma
item.description: The UMA product with software V200R001 and V300R001 has a privilege elevation vulnerability due to insufficient validation or improper processing of parameters. An attacker could craft specific packets to exploit these vulnerabilities to gain elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2017-8127|2024-08-05T16:27:22.870Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- uma
item.description: The UMA product with software V200R001 has a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability due to insufficient input validation. An attacker could craft malicious links or scripts to launch XSS attacks.
